creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky and the Ted and Dr. Roberta Mann Foundation Endowment Fund
medium: Paper, oil, pins, plastic, glass, lotus pods, metal, foam, and linen on panel
text: A densely collaged image features a central figure of a young black male with a large flame at the center of his chest. This central figure is surrounded by innumerable collaged elements, some pasted to the panel, and hundreds of additional paper elements that are pinned to the surface of the work. In addition to paper, there are organic elements such as lotus pods and mother of pearl that are inlaid throughout the work.
title: Revolutionary Song
